item.description:
Yeay! Let's get those bicycles moving!! We're planning to do the East Bay bike path this Saturday, the 1st of August, at 11AM.

Time to burn off some energy so that we can eat and drink at pub night later that day.

This is a long ride, but it will *NOT* be a fast one. This is not a race! It will be a fun ride at a comfortable pace. No need to be nervous if you are not a fast bicyclist. It's a social ride. If you want to just do a portion of the ride, feel free.

This is just as much about meeting some nice folks as it is about enjoying some fresh air.

If it is raining â€“ I will reschedule for another day.

The East Bay bike path is 14.5 miles of paved bike path from Bristol to Providence.

Meet us at Colt State Park in Bristol, Rhode Island

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike.

This will be a joint meetup with the Providence Bicycle meetup Please do not sign up with both meetups. Just pick one.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: Pre-Pub night bicycling!
